nodes.text: How are things going for you?
Wonderful! Esme and I talked about music and dance. She even showed me a few easy dance steps.
So did you step on her feet?
No, we danced holding onto her scarf. It was a traditional folk dance.
Seems like you two make a great pair. A person would have to be 'dance' not to see it.
Of chorus, it's "a natural" that we're together. We'll never be sharp at each other or fall flat. We both re-choir love to sustain us.
So how's your day going?
Much better now that you are here.
So how's your day going?
It would be better if the Drats didn't keep chasing me around the halls.
It could be better, but at least I don't have to worry about the Drats chasing me in the halls.

nodes.message: Adding a tag to make sure that Shawn only tells Aeolus about ending the Drat Invasion once.

nodes.text: You won't have to worry about the Drats running around in the halls now. I dealt with the problem.
Really? How did you get rid of the Drats?
I tracked the Dire Rats to her lair of their Queen. She was a huge, monstrous creature so swollen she could hardly move. She had magical powers and she could summon Drats to attack.
What did you do?
It took every skill I had to avoid her magical attacks and keep the Drats from tearing me to shreds. Finally, I slew her and all the Drats ran off.
You should have told me that you were going into danger! I would have gone with you and helped. You didn't have to risk your life alone.
Hey, don't worry... I handled it. I didn't need back up. The Queen is dead and I'm here to tell about it.
Yeah... but you could have been killed. I don't want to lose you.
Wow... you really are a hero, aren't you?
The Queen Drat was missing a magical amulet. She sent all the Drats into the castle to find it. I gave her the amulet and made her swear to keep her Drats out of the school.
Great... you really are a hero.
When did you talk to Esme?
I met her in the hallway earlier tonight. We talked a while before Terk yelled at us to go to bed.
Did Esme say why she wanted to talk to me?
She said something about the Drats. She had an idea about why they were attacking.
Is that a drumstick in your pocket or are you happy to see me?

I won't re-flute your innuendo. My heart is beating to crescendo. 
There's some bass-is to what you've seen. My heart beats like a tambourine. So at the risk of sounding dumb... would you like to play upon my drum?

options.text: Ask Aeolus to Clean Up the Room

nodes.text: It would be nice to see this room cleaned up.
For you, I'll do anything - Even clean up the mess... eventually.
<sigh> I'll get around to it soon.
If you don't watch out, we'll have Drats nesting in the clothes pile of this room. It will be their home away from home.
I will do my very best to clean up 'ere the Drats do nest.
Okay, okay. I'll try to get to it.
Good night and sleep tight.
Don't let the Dire Rats bite.
